description.en: This is a list of public sector entities in Bolivia, published through SICOES (Sistema de Contraciones Estatales), which is the national state contracting system. It publishes identifiers for a range of entities, including: ministries, departmental and municipal government; national, regional and municipal companies and universities

access.onlineAccessDetails: Access is via the portal which may be filtered https://www.sicoes.gob.bo/portal/clasificadores/institucional.php
access.guidanceOnLocatingIds: Use the provided link and the code is in the column titled "CÃ³digo"
